sentences.sContent: Now, how do we get this unit vector?
sentences.sContent_eng: Now, how do we get this unit vector?
sentences.sCn: 那我们怎么得到这单位矢量呢？

sentences.sContent: This new tutorial will change the way you use vector graphics.
sentences.sContent_eng: This new tutorial will change the way you use vector graphics.
sentences.sCn: 这个新的教程将改变你使用矢量图形的方式。

sentences.sContent: Multiplies every component of this vector by the same component of scale.
sentences.sContent_eng: Multiplies every component of this vector by the same component of scale.
sentences.sCn: 由缩放的相同的组件对应乘以这个矢量的每个组件。

phrases.pCn: 法向量；法向向量；法向矢量

trans.tranOther: a quantity such as force that has a direction as well as size
